[h1]Follow our [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36214917/]Curator Group for more reviews[/url][/h1]
Portal is a classic puzzle platformer that holds up pretty well over a decade later. It features a much better story than 99% of puzzle games and some great dialogue. Many of the puzzles are rudimentary and simplistic, but the free form gameplay adds a lot of variety. While each puzzle has only one correct solution, the ways you get to that solution can vary, depending on how you play. The end result feels like you came up with your own unique solution, even though the pieces of the puzzle are the same for everyone. The game itself is pretty easy once you learn the basics. There will be a number of eureka moments when you discover a new strategy, but the way you go about solving puzzles is never very hard, unlike some more modern puzzle games that focus on extreme difficulty and polished mechanics. Portal focuses on the journey, not the destination, giving it a consistent enjoyment level, instead of the peaks and valleys of harder puzzle games. If you aren't bothered by the lack of difficulty and are intrigued by the portal mechanics, then I highly recommend Portal.

8/10

well, I cant understand the praise this game gets. The portal gun mechanic is awesome, but the puzzles are idiotic, game pshysics is a joke and the game is extremely clunky. The story is stupid and overall this game did nothing for me except to infuriate me.

Portal - schon ewig oft davon gehört, aber nie wirklich einen "Anlass" gehabt es mir anzuschauen. Und ich bin ehrlich gesagt begeistert. Selbst als notorischer Online-Guide-Leser für viele Arten von Puzzles konnte ich hier alles mit ein wenig ausprobieren lösen, generell sind die einzelnen Levels sehr flüssig zu spielen und in sich stimmig. Auch in der deutschen Synchrofassung kommt der Humor gut rüber und die Stimmen sind echt süß. 
Meine Kartoffel von Laptop hat zwar dauernd Striemen im Bild im oberen Viertel des Bildschirms angezeigt, aber das ist ja nicht Schuld des Spiels.
Alles in allem kann ich Portal nur empfehlen!

An amazing, unique and original game, i enjoyed every second of it. An unexpected turn at the end of the game that blew my mind. It can be very difficult to pass some levels like how i was stuck on level 15 for so long until i thought about it and later completed the level. A big thumbs up to Portal and its creators, i give it a five stars. Well done!

C'est un peu "cherry on the cake", la cerise sur le gâteau. 

Un jeu qui vous fait savourer tous les autres, malgré que vous avaliez très vite cette cerise et que vous en redemandiez encore (pourquoi pas se faire le 2 après ?). 

Un classique, un jeu bien différent de beaucoup d'autres, une originalité qui lui aura valu son statut de classique mais aussi de meme. 

Je ne saurais trop le recommander, malgré son temps de jeu cours. 

Et les énigmes des niveaux rajoutés sont bien plus tordues ! 

Bon jeu, have fun

This game is incredible. There is nothing to dislike. You could play it time and time again and never get sick of the puzzles, story, and even the little tricks that can make the came a little bit easier. I highly recommend it, and I think everyone should try it at least once.

Revisited this masterpiece after years and it's still one of the best games I've every played. Simple, direct, engaging. Like its counterpart, the first Half-Life, the game flows with no interruptions and it's the player that defines the speed of progression. 
The writing is excellent and GlaDOS provides some of the best lines in the gaming industry. I will forever love Portal.
Be sure to try the bonus maps and challenges afterward. Pure genius.
